mil3.6.6:0.3: Question on Tears Being a Medicine or Not
mil3.6.6:1.2: “Venerable Nāgasena, those who weep on the death of a mother, and those who weep with affection for the Dhamma, for whom of these two weeping are the tears a medicine, and for whom are the tears not a medicine?”
mil3.6.6:3.1: Question on Tears Being a Medicine or Not sixth
